subsection.name: Get XMlFit release from a maven repo
subsection.p:
Add the follow code to the maven POM to use the XmlFit maven Plugin.
...
fornax.repository Fornax Repository http://xmlfit.sourceforge.net/m2-repo/
...
...
net.sourceforge.xmlfit maven-fit-transformer
generate-sources
transform

subsection.name: Get XMlFit snapshots from a maven repo
subsection.p:
For use snapshots versions of XmlFit add the follow repository to your maven pom.
...
fornax.repository Fornax Repository http://xmlfit.sourceforge.net/m2-repo-snapshots/
...
